verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <S%H7892><s%> shir A Song הַֽמַּֽעֲל֗וֹת <S%H4609><s%> ham-ma-'a-Lot, of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <S%H1732><s%> le-Da-Vid of David יְהוָ֤ה׀ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh LORD לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor גָבַ֣הּ <S%H1361><s%> ga-Vah is not haughty לִ֭בִּי <S%H3820><s%> Lib-bi my heart וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- Nor רָמ֣וּ <S%H7311><s%> ra-Mu lofty עֵינַ֑י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai; nor mine eyes וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- Nor הִלַּ֓כְתִּי׀ <S%H1980><s%> hil-Lach-ti neither do I exercise בִּגְדֹל֖וֹת <S%H1419><s%> big-do-Lot myself in great matters וּבְנִפְלָא֣וֹת <S%H6381><s%> u-ve-nif-la-'ot or in things too high מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni. too

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- lo לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo not שִׁוִּ֨יתִי׀ <S%H7737><s%> shiv-Vi-ti Surely I have behaved וְדוֹמַ֗מְתִּי <S%H1826><s%> ve-do-Mam-ti, and quieted נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi myself כְּ֭גָמֻל <S%H1580><s%> Ke-ga-mul as a child that is weaned עֲלֵ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei child against אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo; of his mother כַּגָּמֻ֖ל <S%H1580><s%> kag-ga-Mul [is] even as a weaned child עָלַ֣י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai within נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi. my soul

יַחֵ֣ל <S%H3176><s%> ya-Chel hope יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el Let Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- in יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; in the LORD מֵֽ֝עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> me-'at-Tah, this וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- from henceforth and for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> o-Lam. ever
